title: Contribution to UNMAS 2018-19 and 2019-20
description: Contribution to United Nations Mine Action Service (UNMAS) to carry out its core activities as United Nations coordinator for mine action, to back stop mine action programmes, to enhace management capacity and business practices and to enable an agile response to emergency situations and crises. Provide support to UNMAS's Afghanistan program. The total investment is $700,000.00 to be expensed in financial year 2018-19 and $400,000.00 to be expensed in financial year 2019-20
